response.overview: Hunter Schafer stars in "The Hunt," a one-minute horror-inspired short film that serves as the campaign for Gentle Monster's Fall 2025 eyewear collection. It is not a full-length feature film, but a promotional piece directed by Nadia Lee Cohen.  In the short film, Schafer portrays a character in an "uncanny suburban town" where reality blurs into a nightmare inspired by classic horror movies.
response.title: The Hunt
